title: LTC2 — Nursing Care and Sheltered Care — Data Dictionary (Draft)

residents_age_sex_*.description: Residents by Age/Sex — as of Dec 31 (Section/Page: Sec I p.4) Male/Female by listed age bands

rate_private_room.description: Private Payment Daily Room Rate — Private Room (Section/Page: Sec I p.5)

residents_mentally_ill.description: Residents diagnosed as Mentally Ill (F01-F69) (Section/Page: Sec I p.6)

residents_identified_offenders.description: Residents categorized as Identified Offenders (Section/Page: Sec I p.6) per 210 ILCS 45/2-201.5

fy_start.description: Fiscal Year Starting Date (Section/Page: Sec II p.7)

oas_*.description: Outpatient/Community-Based Services — avg daily clients (Section/Page: Sec III p.11) One field per service line listed
